name: rinari
description: Modular ORM framework for TypeScript/JavaScript with pluggable drivers

scripts.build:all: npm run build:types && npm run build:orm && npm run build:sqlite && npm run build:bun-sqlite
scripts.build:orm: npm run build:types && cd packages/orm && tsup
scripts.build:sqlite: npm run build:types && npm run build:orm && cd packages/sqlite && tsup
scripts.build:bun-sqlite: npm run build:types && npm run build:orm && cd packages/bun-sqlite && tsup
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces --if-present && rm -rf node_modules data coverage && find . -name 'package-lock.json' -type f -delete && find . -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docs: npm run docs:types && npm run docs:orm && npm run docs:sqlite && npm run docs:bun-sqlite
scripts.docs:types: npm run build:types && cd packages/types && npm install --save-dev typedoc typedoc-plugin-markdown && npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../../docs/api/types src/index.ts --readme none --excludePrivate
scripts.docs:orm: npm run build:types && npm run build:orm && cd packages/orm && npm install --save-dev typedoc typedoc-plugin-markdown && npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../../docs/api/orm src/index.ts --readme none --excludePrivate
scripts.docs:sqlite: npm run build:types && npm run build:orm && npm run build:sqlite && cd packages/sqlite && npm install --save-dev typedoc typedoc-plugin-markdown && npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../../docs/api/sqlite src/index.ts --readme none --excludePrivate
scripts.docs:bun-sqlite: npm run build:types && npm run build:orm && npm run build:bun-sqlite && cd packages/bun-sqlite && npm install --save-dev typedoc typedoc-plugin-markdown && npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out ../../docs/api/bun-sqlite src/index.ts --readme none --excludePrivate

author: OpenUwU
